Package ohos.agp.text

Class RichTextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.RichTextBuilder

  • public class RichTextBuilder
extends Object
    Builder of rich text.

    The effective text style used by the builder is iteratively updated by the merging (adding) a new text style or reverting (deleting) the most recently added one. The newly input text will apply the effective text style.

    Since:
    3

      Default constructor used to create a RichTextBuilder instance.

      Create a RichTextBuilder instance with specified default text form.

      RichText build​()
      Creates a rich text object based on the latest configurations.
      RichTextBuilder mergeForm​(TextForm form)
      Adds a text form to update the effective text form used by the rich text builder.

        Create a RichTextBuilder instance with specified default text form.

    • Method Detail

      • addText

        public RichTextBuilder addText​(String text)
        Adds a text segment with the effective style used by the rich text builder.
        Parameters:
        text - text Indicates the text segment to add.
        Returns:
        Returns the current rich text builder for continuous build.

      • mergeForm

        public RichTextBuilder mergeForm​(TextForm form)
        Adds a text form to update the effective text form used by the rich text builder.
        Parameters:
        form - Indicates the text form to add.
        Returns:
        Returns the rich text builder with the latest effective text form.

      • revertForm

        public RichTextBuilder revertForm​()
        Deletes the most recently added text form to update the effective text form used by the rich text builder.
        Returns:
        Returns the rich text builder with the latest effective text form.

      • build

        public RichText build​()
        Creates a rich text object based on the latest configurations.

        Calling this method will clear the previous configurations.

        Returns:
        Returns the rich text object with the latest configurations.
